cells.data:
A daemonized service is any process that runs as a long-running, self-healing service -- it doesn't interact with the terminal / keyboard / user, and it usually starts at boot time and ends with a `d` e.g. `httpd`, `sshd`.

The Kubernetes equivalent of this is the `DaemonSet` - such pods will run on all cluster nodes to provide background services (think logging, metrics).
